infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your calendar to sync events.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: This app needs full access to your calendar to sync events.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app needs access to your reminders to sync events.
infoPlist.NSRemindersFullAccessUsageDescription: This app needs full access to your reminders to sync events.
